mapper.sql: SELECT A.rsnm, A.iboard, A.rsad ,(SELECT count(*) from t_matzip_fav where iboard=#{iboard} and iuser = #{iuser}) as isFav FROM t_matzip A
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_matzip_fav WHERE iboard = #{iboard}) as favCnt FROM t_matzip WHERE iboard = #{iboard}

SELECT A.*, COUNT(A.icmt) - 1 AS isMore FROM ( SELECT A.icmt, A.cmt, A.regdate, A.iboard , B.iuser, B.nm as writer, B.mainProfile as writerProfile FROM t_matzip_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard} ORDER BY icmt ASC LIMIT 2 ) A GROUP BY A.iboard
SELECT A.*, B.nm as writer FROM t_matzip_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_matzip_cmt ( iboard, iuser, cmt ) VALUES ( ${iboard}, ${iuser}, #{cmt} )
mapper.select: SELECT B.rsnm FROM t_matzip_fav A INNER JOIN t_matzip B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_matzip_fav WHERE iboard=#{iboard} AND iuser=#{iuser}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_matzip_rev(iboard, iuser, irev, dt, memberct) VALUES(#{iboard}, #{iuser}, #{irev}, #{dt}, #{memberct})
mapper.select: SELECT A.dt, A.memberct, B.rsnm FROM t_matzip_rev A INNER JOIN t_matzip B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser}
